section.p: Follow these steps to create a {{ archetype.get_title() }} character sec:character-creation

li.p: Choose a name for the character and write it on the character sheet..
Write your own name in the players name area on the character sheet.
Fill in the Archetype Value: {{ archetype.get_title() }}

olist.li: Fill in your Height: {{ archetype.height }}, Weight: {{ archetype.weight }}, and Age: {{ archetype.age }}. {{ archetype.gender }}
Fill in your characters tags: {{ archetype.get_tags_str() }}

li.p: Choosing one of the following sets of Primary Ability Levels: {{ archetype.get_primary_abilities() }} Then for each ability roll an unmodified Std-Check against a DC of 13. Add one to the ability level for that ability if the check is successful. Add an additional one if a boon is rolled. Subtract one from the level if a bane is rolled. if you get a result of +2 in Strength you should write down Strength II in the primary abilities section of the character sheet.

olist.li: Work out your characters background using the tables from the following Character Background Section. Do this now. It may effect your abilities.
Record your Archetype Move Distance: {{ archetype.get_move_distance() }} and add your Speed Modifier to get your Move and Move Modifier.

Record your characters Health and Stamina:
Stamina =
{{ archetype.get_progression_data_for_level(0).level_stamina }} + Endurance Modifier
Health =
{{ archetype.get_progression_data_for_level(0).level_health }} + Strength Modifier
Your current stamina and health are the same as your full stamina and health. The temporary values are zero, and the refresh rate is {{ archetype.get_progression_data_for_level(0).level_health_refresh }}

Record your characters dice pool: maximum and refresh values. The current values are initially set to the maximum values:
Luck Pool Maximum/Refresh = {{ archetype.get_progression_data_for_level(0).level_luck -}}d6 /{{- archetype.get_progression_data_for_level(0).level_luck_refresh }}d6
Magic Pool Maximum/Refresh =
{{ archetype.get_progression_data_for_level(0).level_magic -}}d6 / {{- archetype.get_progression_data_for_level(0).level_magic_refresh }}d6
Mettle Pool Maximum/Refresh =
{{archetype.get_progression_data_for_level(0).level_mettle -}}d6 / {{- archetype.get_progression_data_for_level(0).level_mettle_refresh }}d6

li.p: Players should choose a few initial aspects for their character. It is best to choose your aspects in a group with the other players and GM. Newly acquired aspects have a difficulty of 9 + d6 unless the archetype description or the GM says otherwise.
Some suggested aspects for this archetype are: {{ archetype.aspect_examples }}. But feel free to choose an aspect of your own. Try to create one that will generate interesting game play.

olist.li: Optionally sketch out a couple of lines of back story with your fellow players and GM with a few points about the characters history. For example, Dourli might come from the Iron Mountains and be searching for his long lost cousin Grimli.

li.p: You get some starting equipment for free: {{ archetype.starting_gear }}
Buy equipment. Now you can purchase any common equipment from the equipment list.

section.p: You are now finished character creation.

subsection.p: The level progression table contains a list of new abilities and promotions the character gets when they gain a new level. Your character automatically receives all innate abilities at first level.
